scripts.dev:mcp: concurrently -n "next,fulfillment,products,mcp-server" -c "blue,green,yellow,magenta" -k --restart-tries 3 --restart-after 3000 -p "[{name}]" "bun run dev" "cd ../.. && cd server/api-fulfillment && bun run dev" "cd ../../server/api-products && bun run dev" "cd ../.. && cd server/mcp-server-js && node src/sse-server.js"
scripts.dev:pydantic: concurrently --force-color -n "next, pydantic-server" -c "blue, green" -k --restart-tries 3 --restart-after 3000 -p "[{name}]" "bun run dev" "cd ../.. && cd server/pydantic-fastapi && poetry run fastapi dev main.py"
